RRB TEXT ORDER: In light of the Notice of Cost Bill Submission filed at docket 117 by BP Products North America Inc., successor-in-interest to BP Oil Supply Company, and the indicated agreement that plaintiff Petro Star Inc. will not object to the itemization and amounts of costs appearing on defendant's cost bill, the requirement under D.Ak. L.R. 54.1(a)(1)[B] that a cost bill hearing be set is hereby waived. The Clerk may proceed to tax costs without a hearing. (PRR, COURT STAFF) (Entered: 12/21/2012)

USCA Memorandum as to 120 Notice of Appeal filed by Petro Star Inc. REVERSED in part; AFFIRMED in part; REMANDED. Each party shall bear its own costs on appeal. (Attachments: # 1 USCA Concurrence / Dissent, # 2 USCA Post Judgment Form)(TYM, COURT STAFF) (Entered: 09/02/2014)

USCA ORDER as to 120 Notice of Appeal filed by Petro Star Inc. Appellant is requested to file a response, not to exceed fifteen pages, to appellees petition for rehearing filed September 12, 2014. The response shall be filed within twenty-one days of the date of this order. IT IS SO ORDERED. (TYM, COURT STAFF) (Entered: 09/19/2014)

USCA ORDER as to 120 Notice of Appeal filed by Petro Star Inc. Judges Wardlaw and Graber voted to deny appellees petition for rehearing, and Judge Wallace voted to grant the petition. The petition for rehearing is therefore DENIED. (TYM, COURT STAFF) (Entered: 10/22/2014)
